resources.string: It’s a small Iranian grocery and convenience store with great regag bread.
Al Fanar is one of the few traditional Emirati restaurants, and they have an impressive menu.
Al Marhabani Restaurant in Dubai is at the top of their mandi game.
It is located in the Al Fahidi Fort, built in 1787 and is the oldest existing building in Dubai.
Established in 2003, XVA is one of the leading galleries in the Middle East that specializes in contemporary art from the Arab world.
The Etihad Museum collects, preserves, and displays the heritage of the United Arab Emirates
Located in the heart of the prestigious Downtown Dubai is The Dubai Mall, the world’s largest and most-visited retail and entertainment destination.
Dubai Shopping Center is located in the area spanning Al Shola Shopping Center to City Center Hotel.
Mall of the Emirates features an unmatched luxury offer housing more than 80 of the world’s most renowned designer brands.
MMA Fitness Centre enables everyone to enjoy the fusion of disciplines, known as Mixed Martial Arts.
It is a community for Dubai ladies to work on their lifestyle and reach their goals in a relaxing environment.
